title: Royal Enfield’s overseas sales double, account for over 15% of total volume
description: Already a global leader in the mid-size motorcycle segment — 250-750 cc — for several years by virtue of large volumes in India, the maker of the iconic Bullet motorcycle started becoming a strong alternative to expensive brands in several matured markets, thanks to its new range of products.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
